column1: Smoque BBQ////Go to this place for the barbecue chicken... Stay for the brisket... And the macaroni and cheese... Okay
column2: the bread pudding is pretty freaking awesome too. What I'm trying to say is... You better be real hungry when you go to this place. The restaurant feels kind of like a school cafeteria. But
column3: that's where the similarities end. I promise
column4: your lunchroom never had tender brisket like this. If it did
column5: you would have failed every class you could... Just so that you can spend more time there. Yeah
